tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Preconception Counseling,Cesarean Delivery,
review:
Dr. Poonam is a gem of a doctor.  She treats the patient with a motherly feeling and is always ensuring we are prepared one step in advance. 

The entire line of treatment starting from conception to delivery and now post delivery stage is really recommendable. 

We will surely refer visiting Dr. Poonam and you wont need any second opinion once you visit it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: God cannot be everywhere so he sent doctors. Dr. Poonam totally justifies this statement. We met Dr Poonam in January this year for treatment of pelvic inflammatory disease. My condition was misdiagnosed by a renowned doctor as genital tuberculosis. I was put on TB medicines, but within a week instead of getting better my health started detoriating. We then consulted a TB specialist who told us that the medicial evidence is not suggestive of TB. He then referred us to Dr. Poonam. On our 1st meeting with Dr. Poonam, mam gave us half an hour to listen to out entire story, saw all our reports patiently.  She then gave me medicines for 1 week to treat the inflammation in my pelvic organs. And after a week, the ultrasound report came perfectly fine. I was cured. I would also like to mention that we were trying for a baby since one and half years before visiting Dr. Poonam. And, in April this year i.e. 2 months after getting treated for PID, I conceived. My pregnancy journey was very smooth thanks to Dr. Poonam. She used to address all sort of questions I asked, used to attend our calls even at odd ours and was always approachable on whatsapp as well. She is very lively in nature, always smiling and treats her patients with utmost sincerity and patience. Even in my pregnancy I faced some issues like high bp, cholestasis but all these were handled very efficiently by Dr. Poonam. My delivery was also an emergency c section at odd hours and Dr. Poonam reached hospital within half an hour. So I would highly recommend Dr. Poonam to everyone. And I really want to thank you mam from the bottom of my heart. Doctors like you are hard to find but thank God we found you.
reply_text: Thanks,dear Priyanka, for such great words

I had a cyst weighing 1.5 kg between ovary‚Äôs and uterus 
Which caused too much pressure on urinary bladder 
So it had to be surgically removed operation was done very well I am still in recovery phase , overall doctor is very good she took all the precautions necessary , I felt comfortable as she explained me how is the operation is going to take place

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I recently had the pleasure of having my mother treated by Dr. Poonam Agarwal, and I couldn't be happier with the experience. My mother needed laparoscopic surgery, which can be a nerve-wracking procedure. However, from the very beginning, Dr. Poonam Agarwal put us both at ease with her calm and reassuring demeanor.

One of the things I appreciated most about Dr. Poonam Agarwal was her ability to explain everything in detail. She took the time to make sure we understood the procedure, the risks involved, and what to expect during and after the surgery. This helped us feel more prepared and less anxious about the whole process.

The surgery itself went smoothly, and my mother's recovery was faster than we had anticipated. Throughout the process, Dr. Poonam Agarwal was always available to answer any questions we had and address any concerns we raised. She has a very caring and empathetic approach, which made us feel like we were in good hands.

Overall, I highly recommend Dr Poonam Agarwal to anyone looking for a knowledgeable, compassionate, and skilled gynaecologist. Her expertise and professionalism are unmatched, and she truly goes above and beyond to ensure her patients receive the best possible care. Thank you, Dr. Poonam Agarwal, for all you've done for my mother - she's doing great now thanks to you!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: The doctor constantly pushed me for maintaining a healthy body weight and lifestyle for trying for a vaginal delivery. She kept a close watch on the size of the baby and was guiding me towards the right course throughout. She is very ************* *** experienced. In Ob-gyn, the doctor‚Äôs right or wrong calls make all the difference and she made all the right ones to let me deliver a healthy child vaginally, as we wanted. The mode of admission, baby‚Äôs size, time of admission, everything worked out just fine with her great wisdom and experience.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I'm delighted to share my heartfelt appreciation and write a glowing review for my extraordinary gyne, Dr. Proonam Aggarwal who guided me throughout my whole journey of pregnancy, ultimately ensuring a successful and safe delivery of my precious child.

From the beginning, Dr.  Poonam Aggarwal showcased a level of expertise and compassion that immediately put me at ease. Despite the numerous complications that arose during my pregnancy, her unwavering commitment and exceptional care provided confidence and trust in me. She possesses a remarkable ability to explain intricate medical concepts with clarity and patience, making sure I understood every aspect of my condition. This not only alleviated any anxieties but also empowered me to actively participate in decisions regarding my health and the well-being of my baby.
I feel fortunate to found a doctor who is not only skilled but also genuinely cares about my health. Thank you so much Dr Poonam Aggarwal.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I was having high risk pregnancy due to unicornuate uterus but all thanks to Poonam mam, my both pregnancies successfully completed under Mam's supervision, she is very experienced and friendly, listen to all your problems and concerns than advice accordingly.
She takes care of me throughout my pregnancy time and guided me, she was always available on call in any emergency.
I always recommend her to my friends and family as she is very good at her work and she is a very nice person as well.
I am blessed to have Dr like her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I was suffering of heavy periods not stopping even after medicines..Dr Poonam treated this first and after some diagnostic tests diagnosed fibroids in uterus,cyst in ovary and adenomyosis. She counseled me so nicely and advised immediate hysterectomy and cyst removal .My surgery was successful and I am amazed how I recovered so soon...I infact asked her how come stitches are not painful  at all !!
She has advised rest for some time so I am following that but actually I feel so normal.. üòä I really thank my stars that I visited Dr Poonam and Am now free of my problems ....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Maternal Care/ Checkup,Pregnant Women Counseling,Nutrition for Pregnant Women,
review:
Going through childbirth is a mix of immense pain followed by immense happiness. In this journey, the presence of a wonderful doctor is simply priceless. As a doctor, she went above and beyond everything I ever would have expected. 

I have recovered well and appreciate all the advice and tips she gave me beforehand about how to deliver a baby. I am very glad to have her there since she have been caring for me since the start of pregnancy. Her easy going manner helped me to relax. I am glad everything went so well! Also the classes she recommended were fantastic and helped me to feel less anxious about the process.

She did what medicine alone would not have done.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Poonam Aggarwal was and is literally a saviour. I had a lot complications during my pregnancy and every time I thought of giving up. But everytime I visited her she did give me a lot of strength and kept me motivated throughout the pregnancy. Finally the d day arrived and she gave me a blessing for life by giving me my son.  I truly recommend her not for the fighter she is but for the motherly concern she shows towards her patients. My sister in law too was treated by her and she is surely going for her second with Poonam ma'am.üôÇ

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
I would highly recommend Poonam ma'am for her kind nature and friendliness with patients in explaining each and every thing. She has been guiding, taking utmost care and made sure the baby is well in all stages of pregnancy with her diagnosis. Poonam ma'am is highly skilled and took care of mine and baby nutrition by suggesting good nutritional food and medicines which proved to be beneficial.
Was always available on call whenever we need her guidance. Also , she made us prepared well for c-sec since baby was in breech position. 
She supported and did operation on time even though we dint had the RTPCR reports with us. She got mine COVID test done on an emergency basis and operation was done successfully and baby was delivered. She took good care of me and mine baby and made sure we both are well post delivery. 
Thankuu so much ma'am for your guidance throughout the journey. It made journey more joyful and informative .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Poonam Agarwal, We would like to say special "Thank you" to Dr. Poonam.I and my Husband would like to thank you for taking part in the birth of our little baby Boy. We all know that the tension was high that day because it was not easy to do normal delivery. we felt like we were in good hands and that gave us peace of mind towards the big day.You are amazing! You knew when to be serious and when to make us laugh. We will never forget that day or you!" We would like to thank you once again for the excellent care you provided me the during pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Poonam Aggarwal, I also searched the name on google after my first visit by someone‚Äôs reference. Her qualifications, experience and reviews were impressive enough. I had large fibroids around uterus and the way Dr Poonam guided and treated me proved to be very helpful to me. She gave me personal attention pre and  post surgery and helped me overcome the fear of surgery‚Äôs consequences. Her soft words are enough to heal u internally. M grateful to almighty and Dr Poonam to bless me with a healthy body again.
Thanx n regards

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I started my checkup at somewhere else initially but during the starting of second trimester i got to know that i am having a large fibroid in the uterus which could impact my pregnancy.
I was afraid as my last doctor stressed me out about the consequences. So,then i started my visits with Dr. Poonam Aggarwal and she responded positively and started my treatment with medications.
My whole pregnancy was in a threat of premature delivery but with her support and by God's grace i delivered my baby girl on the completion of 37th week.
I am truly and heartily thankful to Dr. Poonam Aggarwal.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I recently had uterine fibroids removed via Hysterectomy by Doctor Poonam Aggarwal. Dr Poonam gave utmost care during the whole procedure and handled all my complaints with patience and professionalism. i am releived after being successfully operated and treated perfectly for my ailment. i would strongly recommend Dr Poonam Aggarwal for gynecology issues and treatment. She is an experienced and well qualified doctor who can be trusted and relied for an appropriate treatment with an healing touch.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Me and my wife experienced hand holding at its finest in care of Dr. Agarwal. Her calm demeanor, expert knowledge and comforting nature made the entire journey of our first pregnancy extremely easy. Upon discovery of pregnancy, we sought her counsel and immediately felt like little children ourselves who needed an adult supervision because we were absolutely blank about next steps. I guess she saw this in us and placed utmost care in making us learn the ropes.
For her Coup de grace, she ended up pushing my wife into making as much effort as she could for a normal delivery as she lay on her table.
We are now proud parents to a beautiful daughter, thanks to Dr. Agarwal.
Could not have asked for anyone better!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
#Feedback For Dr.Poonam Agarwal.
During this Pandemic my mom had to get operated for Hysterectomy and AV Repair.  But due to the current scenario I was very worried & sceptical about visiting a hospital and consulting a Gynaecologist. 
Dr. Poonam Agarwal was really instrumental in giving my mom the initial trust and confidence about the surgery. She was very kind & listened to my mom's queries patiently. She also paid attention to all my concerns calmly pre and post surgery. 
Post surgery, on the follow-up days, she gave the same attention to detail as before and was very kind to reply to all my mom's messages. My mom is recovering quite well from the surgery and we are very happy to have found such an experienced and kind Doctor.
A big thank you to Dr.Poonam Agarwal from my whole family. 

-Aditi Khanna

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Labor and Delivery,Pregnancy care and management,Lower Segment Caesarean Section (LSCS),Prenatal Checkup,
review: This was my first pregnancy and being Rh negative and with low lying placenta, I was very anxious in the beginning..Dr. Poonam Aggarwal is a very nice doctor whom I trusted right from the start..She guided me all throughout my pregnancy...I contracted the Covid infection in my last trimester.. Thanks to Dr Poonam who was available on call and allayed my anxieties and fear... With all the complications I was able to get to my term under her observation and delivered a healthy baby girl through an  emergent c sec... thanks to her call for that.. With her as my doctor I was assured that I am in good hands... Thank you so much doctor for giving me the little bundle of joy... really really grateful for your help..  my anxieties and w

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,PCOD/PCOS Treatment,Pregnancy with PCOD,
review:
I consulted Poonam Ma'am before and during my whole pregnancy. I have PCOD and she suggested the best practices to conceive. During my pregnancy, there were risks of High BP, Gestation diabetes and increasing liver enzymes. Her correct guidance and positive attitude gave me strength to deliver a healthy baby. Thanks to the doctor's encouragement, it was a smooth normal delivery. She is very calm and well versed. Even post delivery, she was concerned that I am recovering well. 
Would suggest her to everyone looking for a great gynaecologist around.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This was my first surgery and my experience was very good. The treatment and the way it was provided by the doctor and team was par my expectations. Dr. Poonam has a very kind, warm and jolly nature which makes you feel comfortable with the treatment. I went for complete hysterectomy laparoscopic surgery due to a big uterine fibroid and pain in lower abdomen,back region and other related symptoms. I must say I am fully satisfied with the results and would surely recommend anyone to who might be experiencing same issue or any other gynae related issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I came to know about Dr. Poonam through my cousin.I had no idea what endometriosis was and I had a cyst of 17 cms weighing 1.5kgs, my left ovary wasn't visible in the ultrasound and I also had a cyst in the fallopian tube as well. I had visited 2 doctors before I went to Dr. Poonam. They told me open surgery is the only option, but Dr. Poonam carried out the laproscopic surgery and none of my organs (ovary, fallopian tube) were removed.It was an emotional ride for me and my family,but doctor handled it so well. She answered all our questions patiently and in a very friendly way. She even shared all the details in a very gentle manner without scaring us away. I'm very much thankful to Dr. Poonam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: When I was diagnosed with large uterine fibroids, I was quite apprehensive about undergoing¬†surgery.¬† In the course of consulting various gynaecologists, I chanced upon to meet Dr. Poonam Aggarwal.¬† Her reassuring demeanour put me at ease instantly and I finally made up my mind to get the surgery done.¬† Other than being a very good doctor, one plus point with her is that she gives a sympathetic ear to her patients and patiently listens to and clears their doubts and fears.¬† She is always accessible to them, both on direct phone and whatsapp.¬† I must say that she has removed my fears of doctors to a large extent.¬†

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
